author: mshaladan
title: enjoy stay
text: I have stayed in ŸêA.Roma Lifestyle Hotel . Roma for 3 nights and have been greeted all welcome at the reception and on the length of stay they enjoy the sense of hospitality and are very friendly the rooms are coordinated and attentive. The food in the restaurant is varied, and the competent specialist makes that will clear if the quality of the food is not suitable for Muslims. The resort is very generous and the restaurant is overlooking a picturesque garden. I would highly recommend visiting the hotel and staying there
